#summary How to run it in your local machine.
#labels Featured

As it is JQuery/JavaScript project, running it is simple and no compilation required. With your preferred web browser and [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comparison_of_Subversion_clients SVN Client], you are ready to go! Please follow steps below:
  # Check out the source code with your svn client by follow instructions at http://code.google.com/p/jquery-form-builder-plugin/source/checkout
  # Open `src/formbuilder.html` using your web browser, you should see whatever you saw in the [http://jquery-form-builder-plugin.appspot.com/ demo site] or more (features under development).
  # You can start [HowToCreateNewField creating new field].
